Text:
Outstanding teamwork, thanks everyone for a great download. Seeded back straight away as thanks. Considering what happened later at 3 Mile Island, and recently at Fukushima, this movie is more relevant than it was in '79.
A classic of its genre. Cheers.

How about ....  Chernobyl disaster from 1986 ??? Technologies are more and more advanced but ...still not enough for 100% safety [ see Fukushima  march 2011 where the dimmensions of  the disaster is still much underrated ... no further comments]

....and the HUMAN FACTOR is DECISIVE in both: long term safety strategy and short term [event] disaster prevention... as you can see on WikiPedia and ... in this movie.

Watch and ...learn !!!
